yes.text: Great! And I can hear you too. Bye!

no.text: You will excuse me if I find that highly unlikely. After all, you responded to me and I can hear you just fine. Peace out!

repeat_question.text: Can you repeat the question, please?

sorry_wont_call.text: Sorry if I bothered you, have a nice day! Bye!

yes_i_am_a_robot.text: Actually I am an advanced AI. Just don't tell my boss or I'll be out of a job.

greeting.text: Welcome to United Postal Service! How can I help you?

random.text: Perfect. Any of those programs line up with what youâ€™re working on right now?
Getting back to what we were discussing,
Anyway, Regarding what we were talking about earlier,
To revert to our initial discussion,

when_callback.text: When can I call you back?

i_will_call_back.text: Okay, I'll call you later. Bye!

dont_understand_question.text: Sorry, i dont understand your question. Can you say it otherwise?

dont_understand_request.text: Sorry, i cant do it now. May be some day.

dont_understand_hangup.text: I'm sorry I can barely hear you. I'll try to call you later! Bye!

dont_understand_forward.text: I'm sorry, let me transfer you to another agent. Please stand by!

random.text: Sorry, could you say it again?
Sorry, the connection dropped for a second. Could you say that again?
Sorry, I didn't quite catch that.
Could you say it one more time?
